1010000000100110 0011111101001010 0 -> sum: 1101111101110000, cout: 0

1111100001110101 1100111110101000 1 -> sum: 1100100000011110, cout: 1
0010001111101011 0001101101010001 1 -> sum: 0011111100111101, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
